title: Google Play introduces policies to boost app quality
description:
Google Play has announced a series of initiatives aimed at bolstering the platform’s overall experience and steer users away from low-quality applications. Verification requirements update Earlier this year, Google Play introduced an expanded set of verification requirements for all developers, a move to empower users to make informed choices, combat malware, and reduce fraud. The... Read more »

The post Google Play introduces policies to boost app quality appeared first on Developer Tech News.
